quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task.
author: Cal Newport

quote: The shorter way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: Focus is saying no to a hundred good ideas.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The secret of concentration is the secret of self-discovery.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: My goal is no longer to get more done, but rather to have less to do.
author: Francine Jay

quote: Concentration is the root of all the higher abilities in man.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Flow state occurs when your skill level perfectly matches the challenge at hand.
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quote: The ability to perform deep work is becoming increasingly rare at exactly the same time it is becoming increasingly valuable.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Distraction is the enemy of all great work.
author: Ryan Holiday

quote: The more you concentrate the more you can accomplish.
author: William Feather

quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The successful man is the average man, focused.
author: Unknown

quote: Focus on the signal, not the noise.
author: Nate Silver

quote: The ability to focus is a skill that must be practiced.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Concentrated power is power.
author: Gail Sheehy

quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
author: David Allen

quote: The ability to focus is a competitive advantage in today's economy.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Multitasking is merely the opportunity to screw up more than one thing at a time.
author: Steve Uzzell

quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: A focused mind is the most powerful weapon in the world.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The shorter way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
author: Mozart

quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
author: John Carmack

quote: The most important thing about goals is having one.
author: Geoffry F. Abert

quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
author: David Allen

author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The way we spend our time defines who we are.
author: Jonathan Estrin

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: It's not always that we need to do more but rather that we need to focus on less.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: You may delay, but time will not.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Time management is life management.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Being busy does not always mean real work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage to say no to other things.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: The shorter the deadline, the more you get done.
author: Parkinson's Law

quote: Productivity is about the systems, not the goals.
author: James Clear

quote: The key to productivity is to rotate your avoidance techniques.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The secret of getting things done is to act.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Zoey Sayward

quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
author: Marvin Phillips

quote: The best way to get something done is to begin.
author: Unknown

quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
author: Rikki Rogers

quote: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

quote: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
author: Buddha

quote: In today's rush, we all think too much—seek too much—want too much—and forget about the joy of just being.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Mindfulness isn't difficult, we just need to remember to do it.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: The little things? The little moments? They aren't little.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The only way to live is by accepting each minute as an unrepeatable miracle.
author: Tara Brach

quote: Mindfulness is simply being aware of what is happening right now without wishing it were different.
author: James Baraz

quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness helps you go home to the present.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: Wherever you are, be there totally.

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The creative process is not controlled by a switch you can simply turn on or off; it's with you all the time.

quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Creativity is piercing the mundane to find the marvelous.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The creative adult is the child who survived.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Art is the elimination of the unnecessary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Creativity is just connecting things.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The creative process is a process of surrender, not control.

quote: The worst thing you write is better than the best thing you didn't write.

quote: The most productive people are the most organized.

quote: Efficiency is doing better what is already being done.

quote: Productivity is never an end in itself, only a means.

quote: The effective executive focuses on contribution.

quote: Work expands to fill the time available.
author: Cyril Northcote Parkinson

quote: Productivity is about working on the right things.

quote: The key to productivity is energy management.

quote: Done is better than perfect.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: Productivity is about creating more value with less effort.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The most productive tool is a prioritized to-do list.

quote: Productivity is not about being busy, but about being effective.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The unexamined workflow is not worth following.
author: David Allen

quote: Productivity is the art of making time work for you.

quote: The best productivity system is the one you actually use.
author: James Clear

quote: Productivity is about momentum, not motivation.

quote: The productive mind is an organized mind.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Effectiveness is about doing the right things, efficiency is about doing things right.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Productivity is the bridge between dreams and reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The most productive hours are the focused hours.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Productivity is about leverage, not effort.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The organized workspace is the productive workspace.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Productivity is the art of eliminating the unnecessary.
author: Leo Babauta

quote: The productive person works smarter, not just harder.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Productivity is about progress, not perfection.
author: James Clear

quote: The most productive tool is a deadline.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Productivity is about creating value, not just activity.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The productive life is the intentional life.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Productivity is the result of good habits, not good intentions.
author: James Clear

quote: The organized mind achieves more with less stress.
author: David Allen

quote: Productivity is about working when you work, and resting when you rest.
author: Alex Soojung-Kim Pang

quote: The productive person knows when to stop.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Productivity is about quality time, not quantity time.
author: Tony Schwartz

quote: The most productive decisions are made in advance.
author: James Clear

quote: Productivity is the art of making important things easy.
author: BJ Fogg

quote: The productive workflow is the automated workflow.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Productivity is about reducing friction, not increasing effort.
author: James Clear

quote: The organized day is the productive day.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Productivity is about systems that work when you don't.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The productive mind is a present mind.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Productivity is about working with your energy, not against it.
author: Tony Schwartz

quote: The most productive tool is a clear mind.
author: David Allen

quote: Productivity is about doing less, but better.
author: Greg McKeown

quote: The productive person knows what not to do.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Productivity is the result of focused attention.
author: Cal Newport

quote: The organized life is the efficient life.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Productivity is about creating habits that create results.
author: James Clear

quote: The productive workflow eliminates decision fatigue.
author: Roy F. Baumeister

quote: Productivity is about working from your calendar, not your to-do list.
author: Cal Newport

quote: The most productive hours are protected hours.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Perseverance is the stubborn refusal to quit.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Perseverance is not a passive waiting, but an active endurance.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The oak sleeps in the acorn, persistence awakens it.
author: James Allen

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
author: Marvin Phillips

quote: Perseverance is the mother of all good fortune.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The key to perseverance is to see failure as a stepping stone, not a stopping place.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Perseverance is the secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The difference between stumbling blocks and stepping stones is how you use them.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliott

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Perseverance is the courage to ignore the voice that says quit.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Perseverance is the power to begin again when you feel like giving up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep going when everything says stop.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Perseverance is the determination to keep moving forward.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Perseverance is the ability to suffer through a difficult process without giving up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a mountain and a molehill is your perspective.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the bridge between failure and success.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Perseverance is the stubborn refusal to be discouraged.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a winner and a loser is a winner gets up one more time.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep trying when others have given up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Perseverance is the key that unlocks the door to success.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a dream and a goal is a plan and action.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep going when the going gets tough.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to fail is to quit.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the ability to endure temporary defeat on the way to ultimate victory.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep your eyes on the prize.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep trying when everything seems hopeless.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a stumbling block and a stepping stone is how high you raise your foot.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep moving forward when you feel like going back.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep trying when you feel like quitting.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep going when the road gets rough.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep trying when success seems far away.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The difference between a winner and a loser is a winner gets up one more time.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep moving forward when you feel like giving up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Mindfulness is the gentle effort to be continuously present with experience.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The present moment is a gift, that's why it's called the present.
author: Unknown

quote: Mindfulness means paying attention in a particular way: on purpose, in the present moment.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Mindfulness is about love and loving life. When you cultivate this love, it gives you clarity.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The now is all there is, and the future is just another present moment to live when it arrives.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience.
author: Sylvia Boorstein

quote: To be mindful is to be truly alive, present and at one with those around you.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness helps us freeze the frame so that we can become aware of our sensations and experiences.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Mindfulness is the energy of being aware and awake to the present moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Be where you are, not where you think you should be.
author: Unknown

quote: Mindfulness is a way of befriending ourselves and our experience.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The things that matter most in life are not things, but moments.
author: Unknown

quote: Mindfulness is the basic human ability to be fully present.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Mindfulness is the practice of returning to the present moment again and again.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: The more you are focused on time—past and future—the more you miss the Now.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Mindfulness is the art of observing your thoughts and feelings without judgment.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Life is available only in the present moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the doorway to the full experience of life.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Mindfulness is simply being aware of what is happening right now without wishing it were different.
author: James Baraz

quote: The past is gone, the future is not yet here, and if we do not go back to ourselves in the present moment, we cannot be in touch with life.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the heart of Buddhist meditation.
author: Nhat Hanh

quote: What day is it? It's today, squeaked Piglet. My favorite day, said Pooh.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Mindfulness is the miracle by which we master and restore ourselves.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience.
author: Sylvia Boorstein

quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the practice of paying attention to the present moment with intention.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Smile, breathe and go slowly.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the energy that helps us recognize the conditions of happiness that are already present in our lives.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the path to the deathless; unmindfulness is the path to death.
author: Buddha

quote: Breathing in, I calm body and mind. Breathing out, I smile.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the quality of being present and fully engaged with whatever we're doing.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is the practice of being awake and aware in each moment.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Creativity is seeing what others see and thinking what no one else ever thought.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The creative process is a process of surrender, not control.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The creative adult is the child who survived.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Creativity is piercing the mundane to find the marvelous.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Creativity is just connecting things.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Creativity is a wild mind and a disciplined eye.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: The creative process is not controlled by a switch you can simply turn on or off.
author: Alvin Ailey

quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
author: William Plomer

quote: The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: The creative mind plays with the objects it loves.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Creativity is the ability to introduce order into the randomness of nature.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The function of creativity is to ask questions, not answer them.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Creativity is the quality that you bring to the activity that you are doing.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The creative process is a process of discovery.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the way I share my soul with the world.
author: Brene Brown

quote: The creative individual has the capacity to free himself from the web of social pressures.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: Creativity is a type of learning process where the teacher and pupil are located in the same individual.
author: Arthur Koestler

quote: The world is but a canvas to the imagination.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Creativity is the natural order of life. Life is energy: pure creative energy.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: The creative process is a process of transformation.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the power to act in uncertainty.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative process is a process of becoming.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is a great motivator because it makes people interested in what they are doing.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: The creative individual is capable of coping with the uncertainties and ambiguities of life.
author: Frank Barron

quote: Creativity is the ability to see things from a new perspective.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: The creative mind is a playful mind.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Creativity is the ability to generate new ideas.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: The creative process is a process of exploration.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the power to bring something new into existence.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative individual is willing to take risks.
author: Frank Barron

quote: Creativity is the ability to see relationships where none exist.
author: Thomas Disch

quote: The creative process is a process of healing.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the ability to find new solutions to old problems.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: The creative mind is a curious mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
author: William Plomer

quote: The creative process is a process of self-discovery.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the ability to make the ordinary extraordinary.
author: Paul Rand

quote: The creative individual has the courage to be different.
author: Frank Barron

quote: Creativity is the power to transform reality.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative process is a process of liberation.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the ability to see what everyone else has seen and think what no one else has thought.
author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quote: The creative mind is a flexible mind.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Creativity is the power to imagine the impossible.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative process is a process of growth.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the ability to find order in chaos.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The creative individual is open to experience.
author: Frank Barron

quote: Creativity is the power to bring beauty into the world.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative process is a process of expression.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Creativity is the ability to make something out of nothing.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: The creative mind is an original mind.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Creativity is the power to change the world.
author: Roll May

quote: The creative process is the process of life itself.
author: Julia Cameron
